__e: This is the part I never get used to. No one does. How are my friends going to die?
Maybe we should talk to his cell mates, because whatever his problem is, he didn't keep it to himself.
And then,last month,I ran into a sister and she told me that. One of his gambling buddies had been shut upstate New York.
He said that your two companions were already sent to the launch base.
Must we hide here so quietly while our comrades are in danger?
Simple. I wanna know why the Companions are here.
